news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Jejakin, an Indonesian climate tech provider, has secured $2.7 million in new funding to support its carbon management platform. The company, operational since 2018, assists businesses in computing operational emissions and implementing climate change abatement strategies.

about_short_description.short_description: Jejakin is an end-to-end carbon management system and climate tech solutions

product.name: CarbonIQ
product.description: A carbon management platform designed to simplify the process of calculating greenhouse gas emissions for enterprises.

product.name: MangroveGift Set
product.description: A product offering that includes the planting of a mangrove tree, an e-certificate of ownership, and environmental conservation contributions.

product.name: Carbon Emission Calculator
product.description: An online tool available on Jejakin's platform for individuals and organizations to calculate their carbon footprint.

product.name: Tree and Carbon Offset Marketplace
product.description: An online marketplace where users can participate in tree adoption or purchase carbon units to offset their carbon footprint.

product.name: GoGreener Tree Collective Program
product.description: A collaboration with Gojek Indonesia for planting fruit trees in buffer villages around national parks to act as carbon sinks.

product.name: CarbonAtlas
product.description: A monitoring tool based on DMRV (Digital Measurement, Reporting, and Verification) for tracking the impact of tree-planting efforts.
